data.eml:eml: Goniothalamus flagellistylus Tagane & V. S. Dang (Annonaceae), a new species from Mt. Hon Ba, Vietnam

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tagane, Shuichiro, Dang, Van Son, Yahara, Tetsukazu, Toyama, Hironori, Tran, Hop (2015): Goniothalamus flagellistylus Tagane & V. S. Dang (Annonaceae), a new species from Mt. Hon Ba, Vietnam. PhytoKeys 50: 1-8, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.50.4427, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.50.4427
